description: Top level site for Verde timor leste.  This site describes our diverse services in Timor Lest

home.title: Welcome to Verdeka Recycling and Marketing Consultant Services
home.description:
Verdeka Recycle NS  D Unip Lda is an established company in Timor Leste.   We are project based organization with over 10 years experience working in Timor Leste. We provide recycling solutions,  management consulting and marketing services  to a variety of customers.  

Our three current projects are described below in more detail in the listing and they have separate websites for details and additional information
